about.title: About
about.subtitle: A new journey has begun.<0/>Let us guide you in creating your compass!
about.description: Discover your student life at Seneca College and featured activities designed for Vietnamese students with Vietnamese Association at Seneca (VAS)

featuring.title: Featuring
featuring.description: With a variety of programs, Seneca College is one of the Ontario colleges that attract thousands of students internationally every year, including Vietnamese students. To provide our new students with the latest updates regarding services and information supported by Seneca, the Vietnamese Association at Seneca (VAS) would like you to join our 2021 Summer Orientation.

timeline.title: In the orientation, you will be informed about:

events.title: Information about SIV
events.description: Offices, study permit, scholarship, overseas study, etc.

events.title: VAS activities
events.description: Activities that will happen in Summer Term

events.title: Compass #3
events.description: Students’ life in Canada: What’s important?

register.subtitle: Make your compass for the first semester
register.description: Save your spot and have your questions ready to be answered!
